title: How Do We Raise a Strong Daughter?
description:
Amy and Jason ask Dr. Laura how best to guide their young daughter away from making some of the mistakes that her female relatives have made. - Dr. Laura: "Teach your daughter acceptable behavior while giving her room to learn on her own."

What's the best advice you received growing up? Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com 

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment.
